reviews.text: Go there for a drink and to enjoy the atmosphere, honestly the food is garbage!  Wouldnâ€™t pay a penny for that kind of food.  Servers are good and attentive, place looks really nice, my issue was with high priced low quality food!

Sehr cooles Ambiente, danke an Sade! Die Bedienung war super :D
AuÃŸerdem ein sehr angenehmes Restaurant , da die Musik nicht zu laut ist und man sich sehr gut unterhalten kann :)
Caroline and Bre were wonderful! I went with my family and they were both so helpful will definitely come back to see these two.
Comimos muy bien
Rosie is the best! Sheâ€™s kind and very professional! Thank you Rosie!
Delicious
JANIEL es el mejor camarero de todo NY!! Servicio de 10, ambiente de 10 y la comida estÃ¡ muy bienâ€¦ mucha cantidad y estÃ¡ rica, es un sitios emblemÃ¡tico al que debes venir si o si.
The crab and lobster and shrimp ğŸ¤ is the best. They actually season their food. Anytime I want a seafood boil,  this is where I come. Never disappoints

Ich war etwas skeptisch. Aber der Laden hat mich echt Ã¼berzeugt. Leckeres Essen, schÃ¶nes Ambiente im Herzen von Manhattan.
Und das Beste war sie immer freundliche und aufmerksame Kellnerin.
Preise fÃ¼r Manhattan auch vÃ¶llig okay.
Klare Empfehlung.

A.G
Excellent service â€” warm, efficient, and thoughtful throughout. She made me feel very welcome and taken care of.

Das Bubba Gump am Times Square ist absolut empfehlenswert! Das Personal ist unglaublich freundlich, aufmerksam und hilfsbereit â€“ besonders Joey, der sich mit echter Herzlichkeit um die GÃ¤ste kÃ¼mmert. Die Aussicht aus der ersten Etage direkt auf den Times Square ist groÃŸartig. Wer in New York ist, sollte unbedingt hier vorbeischauen!

My god was dining at Bubba Gumpâ€™s a truly phenomenal experience. Iâ€™m at a loss for words. Food was on point, and it tasted like the most expensive fine dining while still at attractive prices. But the real delight of my visit was Jayden. He was the best server I have ever had in my entire lifetime of traveling the world and eating at the best restaurants known to man. He single handed lay juggled dozens of tables at once, while still catering to our every request, now matter how big or small, instantly and with a bright smile on his face. Jayden really made my day!

A New Yearâ€™s Tradition Like No Other!

Weâ€™ve been celebrating New Yearâ€™s Eve at Bubba Gump Times Square for the past six yearsâ€”and every single time has been magical!

This is truly a once-in-a-lifetime event that weâ€™ve been lucky enough to experience again and again. The energy is unmatched: you're right in the heart of Times Square, inside a warm, festive space with incredible views of the Ball Drop through the windows. Watching the crowds and excitement outside while enjoying the party indoors is the perfect balance of comfort and thrill.

Depending on NYPD and crowd control, weâ€™ve even had the chance to step outside and experience the Ball Drop in person, itâ€™s simply unforgettable. The moment the clock strikes midnight, the confetti rains down, and everyone sings "New York, New York" by Frank Sinatra...Goosebumps every time!

The food and drinks never disappoint; Bubba Gumpâ€™s knows how to keep the celebration going with a great menu and flowing drinks. The staff is absolutely phenomenal: friendly, helpful, and truly committed to making the night special.

If youâ€™re looking for a safe, fun, and iconic way to ring in the New Year, this is it. Weâ€™ll be back again, because Bubba Gumpâ€™s NYE is our favorite way to start the year.
Super expÃ©rience dans cet endroit typique. Sur le thÃ¨me de Forest Gump. Poissons et viandes cuisinÃ©es Ã  lâ€™Americaine. Les serveurs sont super sympas. Vue  sur Time square.
Top

Bubba Gump was an absolute thrill to dine at and the service was of the highest caliber. The waiters were all as amiable as can be. Its picturesque, sleek and retrochic looks transform a movie staple into a symbol of American pride and fine dining. Jayden was an absolute delight and he is a doll who catered to every need we had. All in all, Bubba Gump Shrimp Company is a simply stunning dining experience and Jayden was at the forefront of it. The atmosphere and looks were cunning and sharp second to an excalibur. This experience was an exuberant excursion. Donâ€™t even get me started on this delectable, exquisite, marvelous, and simply enthralling experience. The fish and chips were savory and top notch. When one of our members needed more chicken, he brought more out in SECONDS. MERE SECONDS, NANOSECONDS. Jayden brought us ice cream sandwiches which were of course, delectable. This is a mere testament of Jaydenâ€™s profound culinary excellence. May god bless his soul! Jayden, in a way that not other man would manage to do, combines the simple yet profound ideals of the American man with the goals and acumen of a contemporary visionary. His bravado in hospitality is a testament to his world-class skills and personality, which are shown in his masterful culinary masterpieces. Masterful yet gentle, he handled our food with love and care, and treated us as though we were kings. The experience was reminiscent of the classic meals served in oneâ€™s humble household, but also of dining in a world-renowned restaurant. This restaurant reminds us all of the humble beginnings of mankind and simply allows us to ponder the future. Jayden was truly inspirational and a phenomena of the modern era. Jayden was a truly inspirational figure in our dining experience and motivated us all to build a better America for hard-workers like Jayden who built the very country we stand in. This unsung hero should be praised and rewarded for all of his hard work which we can personally attest to.

To summarize all of our adoration for this man and this restaurant, I beseech you to try it.

Aucune considÃ©ration pour les clients, organisation dÃ©plorable. TrÃ¨s dÃ©Ã§us.

i enjoyed yesterday when i was at this restaurant it was mad good i highly recommend the mac&cheese was so good it was so delicious oml no words can describe how good that mac was  and the workers were nice and respectful too most definitely coming back too them

L'ambiance est sympa et les serveurs au top et prÃ©venant. La cuisine est trÃ¨s moyenne. Soit trÃ¨s Ã©picÃ©e soit dÃ©nuÃ©e de saveur.
On s'attendait Ã  un peu mieux. Au moins que le plat soit mangeable. Jumbalaya uniquement saturÃ© en piment, impossible d'avoir le goÃ»t des autres aliments. Prix relativement correct pour new york avec un bel emplacement.
Jaden was a great waiter, he had a good vibe
Jayden was rlly nice

Came here for lunch recently. Ordered the salad that comes with chicken, strawberries, and apple. It was pretty good. Large portion that could easily be shared between two people.
I had the Lava Flow. It was delicious!
Service was not great though. Multiple team members walked by us without acknowledging that we had flipped the sign to stop for water refills and the check.

Fantastic experience at Bubba Gump Shrimp Co.! ğŸ¦ Fun and relaxed atmosphere, friendly staff who are always smiling. The Forrest Gump-inspired theme makes everything even more enjoyable, with lots of details that take you back to the film. The shrimp are simply delicious â€” I recommend the "Coconut Shrimp" and "Shrimper's Heaven"! Generous portions, fast service and excellent value for money for New York.
Been a few years I haven't been to Bubba Gump.  I am so glad it was chosen, I enjoyed the food.

El lugar muy bonito, la comida muy rica, solo que nos trajeron los appetizers con la comida, no nos dieron tiempo para disfrutar la entrada, despuÃ©s las primeras bebidas deliciosas, las Ãºltimas que pedimos fueron terribles, no termino la experiencia como querÃ­amos

Thank you for your kindness and for the quiz   in French!
Le dÃ©cor sur le thÃ¨me du film de Forest Gump est beau mais dommage nous aurions aimÃ© entendre aussi les musiques du film.

Went there with a very dear friend.  Both of us have never been there before.  The service and atmosphere were perfect.  I had the shrimp combo, and she had stuffed shrimp. Both meals were right on point. Our server, Brandi, was one of the best we had the pleasure of waiting on us. I must say that for being in Times Square, the pricing was reasonable.  Definitely a go back place had a fun.
One question for the restaurants name, Bubba Gump, is that there is nothing on the menu carrying that name ğŸ˜‹
